links: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Low-Dimensional Lattices VII: Coordination Sequences, Proc. Royal Soc. London, A453 (1997), 2369-2389 (Abstract, pdf, ps).
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7, -21, 35, -35, 21, -7, 1).
prog: (Python) (replace leading dots with blanks)# _George F. Johnson_ Feb 02 2013R=[]for n in range(29):....r=4*n*n*(2*n*n +7)*(n*n +14)/45 +2-0**n....R=R+[r]print R
